post.title: ZeroNet相关
post.body:
- __入门__
    + [gfwtalk置顶帖](http://127.0.0.1:43110/gfwtalk.bit/?Topic:1_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/+4+26+Update+zeronet+tor+browser+tor)
    + [零网中文教学 wiki - 编程随想之友](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NCezLP8aXjABVreBB1CKGPub2tKTtyhWU)
    + [如何免费申请一个 .bit 域名](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DDwUbtyWPokkZnVn1cNvWyWzSNJcq4uKq/?Post:5:%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%85%8D%E8%B4%B9%E7%94%B3%E8%AF%B7%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA+.bit+%E5%9F%9F%E5%90%8D)
        - _chrome浏览器可以安装ZeroNet插件支持ZeroNet协议,可直接省略前缀用比特币域名访问_
![bianle.bit](http://7xlbo3.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/2016/04/27/zeronet2.png)
    + [代理服务器列表](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroproxies.bit/)
- __博客推荐__
    + [编程随想的博客](http://127.0.0.1:43110/15gfg6DUVkp7ApLSMQvC2ig5qy8j91jXeW/)
    + [杨深锐的博客](http://127.0.0.1:43110/19fZz85PJXLAuwpGWe2fLEnU6Z1heprFFJ/)
- __论坛推荐__
    + [gfwtalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/gfwtalk.bit)
    + [GanXingQu](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NzWeweqJ32aRVdM5UzFnYCszuvG5xV3vS/)
        - [网站推荐](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NzWeweqJ32aRVdM5UzFnYCszuvG5xV3vS/?Topic:3_1M1c7x7SLau8D2bm8Gw8iWQbBqe9X4zqPw/List+of+Zites+Zeronet)

post.title: ZeroNet开启自由世界传送门
post.body: 前几天还在搜去中心化，今天就在月光博客([使用ZeroNet搭建P2P全球网站](http://www.williamlong.info/archives/4574.html))上就结识了ZeroNet。
